channel.title: PvP Planet V2.5 - By Jinrake
channel.description:
[b] Client: Bluurs go download it yourself
[/b]
[b]Features:[/b]
[i] - High stablility! Can hold alot of players!! - Full PVP World [like RuneScape] - Fun pvp area [Get points] - Perfect combat - Drops [like RuneScape] - Level Differences [+ and -] [like runescape] [Goes up and down depending on location] - PVP Point Exchange - Barrows, Fight pits [RANDOM REWARDS!], Jad [63 Waves], Godwars [Drops all godswords and sara sword], Dragon plate, kite, claws - Full dangerous slayer! - All potions work - Pest control,Assault [/i]
Pictures: [img]http://i43.tinypic.com/nq8bgw.jpg[/img] [img]http://i43.tinypic.com/2whkn06.jpg[/img] [img]http://i42.tinypic.com/swspvo.jpg[/img] [img]http://i44.tinypic.com/2qbr86x.jpg[/img] [img]http://i39.tinypic.com/f3rf50.jpg[/img] [img]http://i42.tinypic.com/106cylz.jpg[/img] [img]http://i42.tinypic.com/m9yseg.jpg[/img] [img]http://i42.tinypic.com/zstuo3.jpg[/img] [img]http://i42.tinypic.com/1rrpdi.jpg[/img] [img]http://i44.tinypic.com/15ecqbs.jpg[/img] [img]http://i43.tinypic.com/v5ljx4.jpg[/img] [img]http://i44.tinypic.com/35avdvk.jpg[/img] [img]http://i44.tinypic.com/288a5xj.jpg[/img] [img]http://i39.tinypic.com/2h2fgh5.jpg[/img]
[code]http://www.mediafire.com/?zzczzdjwjjg[/code]
NOTE: He gave me permission to post this, so I could try and revive this source!
Good luck. May the best be rewarded!

item.description:
@Qwzownage wrote:

[quote=“sig00, post:8, topic:341682”]Was this the latest version of pvp planet, I loved this server

And I can’t seem to find a Bluurs client that hasn’t been cleaned, I need the one jinrake had because it had the donator cape in there.

And last, when I try to use the run.exe I get an error because I’m 64 bit.[/quote]Go to server help and ask if som1 can help with that, theres a way to change 32 bit to 64 bit.
